body.name: King Size Bed Frame 18 Inch Heavy Duty Metal Frames with Steel Slats Support Ample Storage No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly, Noise Free, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 4 mins
features: ROBUST AND DURABLE : The platform bed is steel bar construction, noise-free structure, and enhanced leg support, providing you with a stable bed frame for a good night's sleep.
EASY ASSEMBLY : The package include all required hardware and a clear installation instructions to help you install this full size metal bed frame in few minutes.
NO BOX SPRING NEEDED : Dependable metal slats support platform bed frame will extend the life of your memory foam, latex or spring mattress
HEADBOARD RESERVED HOLES : You can DIY your own standard-sized headboard for this metal platform by using the reserved holes.
AMPLE STORAGE SPACE : With ample under bed storage to store more debris, more easy to clean, and makes your room look more cleaner and tidier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pretty tall frame, lovely storage underneath, took an hour to put together by myself! (Being 9 months pregnant) only issue was a small part was bent inwards but was an easy fix with a hammer. Very sturdy and seems reliable. I'd say go ahead and buy! Great purchase for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bed frame
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and use with only a mattress. Offers plenty of clearance beneath the bed frame for storage. The bed frame is very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame was so inexpensive I didn't have super high expectations but I'm really glad I gave it a shot. It came in a matter of a couple days. The instructions were simple and easy but honestly I could have figured it out without them. It went together so fast, just a couple of screws and some lining up of the slats and it was done. Also really great that the slats are metal too so they just pop into place and it's done...extremely sturdy. 100% recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ordered 2 and 1 was great
reviews.reviewText: I took off 1 star because I ordered 2 of these - a king size and a twin size. I was able to put the king together fairly quickly and all the pieces were provided and lined up perfectly. Great quality for a great price.But the twin one was another thing...the bars did not line up and I had to put it together without some of the pieces and it's slightly crooked.I did not try to contact customer service because they would have needed to send a whole new one and that would have been a pain. I was able to make it work with what we had and we only need it for about 1.5 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: Amazing bed frame , high off floor, easy to put together. Strong material

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Let me first say, we are not idiots, we purchase and put things together all the time. But the Instructions image was backwards, so took 2 people 2 hours to put this nightmare together because the orientation was wrong. But once we realized that, then it all fit correctly. I have absolutely no idea what went wrong. Seemed sturdy. One person (me) got on very slowly. Crawled to the middle. The second I crawled past the middle, BOOM. Crashed 18 inches to the ground in what sounded like a car accident, all that metal on the wood floor. Sent me into a panic attack in front of my kids. Back is HURTING. Now I gotta pack this crap up and send it back. No idea what the issue was. Be careful. It really hurt and could have killed our pets who like to crawl under beds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Easy To Set Up and Great Quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Loved this! Took maybe 30 minutes to put together! The frame is very strong and it doesn’t slide around on my hardwood floor.It came with all the tools you need to put it together, if you have your own tools it might be easier since everything is so new it was kind of difficult to screw in the bolts with the tools they gave us. Don’t get me wrong they’ll work but it will just take a lot longer in my opinion than it would if u used your own tools!I love how tall the bed is, I got the 18” and it’s perfect! So much room for storage under the bed!!Very very good quality for the price!The box it came in is VERY heavy btw!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Assembled this with my son since it was so easy to set up. Good hight off the ground for storage and easily holds weight.
